    • Method Detail

      • getSequenceNumber

        public long getSequenceNumber()
        Returns the current sequence number.
        Returns:
        the sequence number

      • increaseSequenceNumber

        public void increaseSequenceNumber()
        Increases the current sequence number. Should be called after receiving/sending a message.

      • computeKeys

        public void computeKeys(TlsRandom clientRandom,
                        TlsRandom serverRandom,
                        byte[] masterSecret)
        Computes encryption, MAC and AEAD keys depending on the current cipher suite.
        Parameters:
        clientRandom - the client random value
        serverRandom - the server random value
        masterSecret - the master secret

      • hasComputedKeys

        public boolean hasComputedKeys()
        Returns whether the keys have been computed.
        Returns:
        true, if the keys have been computed

      • getClientWriteMacKey

        public byte[] getClientWriteMacKey()
        Returns the client write MAC key. Must have been computed. The length is dependent on the current cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the client write MAC key

      • getServerWriteMacKey

        public byte[] getServerWriteMacKey()
        Returns the server write MAC key. Must have been computed. The length is dependent on the current cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the server write MAC key

      • getClientWriteEncryptionKey

        public byte[] getClientWriteEncryptionKey()
        Returns the client write encryption key. Must have been computed. The length is dependent on the current cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the client write encryption key

      • getServerWriteEncryptionKey

        public byte[] getServerWriteEncryptionKey()
        Returns the server write encryption key. Must have been computed. The length is dependent on the current cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the server write encryption key

      • getClientWriteIv

        public byte[] getClientWriteIv()
        Returns the client write IV. Must have been computed. The length is dependent on the current cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the client write IV

      • getServerWriteIv

        public byte[] getServerWriteIv()
        Returns the server write IV. Must have been computed. The length is dependent on the current cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the server write IV

      • setCipherSuite

        public void setCipherSuite(TlsCipherSuite cipherSuite)
        Sets the cipher suite.
        Parameters:
        cipherSuite - the cipher suite. Must not be null.

      • getCipherSuite

        public TlsCipherSuite getCipherSuite()
        Returns the current cipher suite, which must have been set before.
        Returns:
        the current cipher suite

      • getKeyExchangeAlgorithm

        public TlsKeyExchangeAlgorithm getKeyExchangeAlgorithm()
        Returns the used key exchange algorithm for the current connection. The cipher suite must have been set before.
        Returns:
        the key exchange algorithm

      • plaintextToCiphertext

        public TlsCiphertext plaintextToCiphertext(TlsPlaintext plaintext,
                                           TlsEncryptionParameters parameters)
        Transforms a TLSPlaintext to a TLSCiphertext. The Message will be MACed and encrypted according to the used ciphersuite.
        Parameters:
        plaintext - the TLSPlaintext
        parameters - the encryption parameters used to encrypt
        Returns:
        the TLSCiphertext

      • ciphertextToPlaintext

        public TlsPlaintext ciphertextToPlaintext(byte[] ciphertextBytes,
                                          TlsEncryptionParameters parameters,
                                          TlsCipherSuiteRegistry registry,
                                          TlsKeyExchangeAlgorithm algorithm)
                                   throws TlsBadRecordMacException,
                                          TlsBadPaddingException,
                                          TlsDecodeErrorException
        Transforms a TLSCiphertext to a TLSPlaintext. The Message will be decrypted and the MAC will be checked according to the used ciphersuite.
        Parameters:
        ciphertextBytes - the TLSCiphertext bytes
        parameters - the encryption parameters used to decrypt
        registry - the cipher suite registry
        algorithm - the used key exchange algorithm
        Returns:
        the TlsPlaintext
        Throws:
        TlsBadRecordMacException - if the message has an invalid MAC
        TlsBadPaddingException - if decryption of the messages fails because of invalid padding
        TlsDecodeErrorException - if the message itself can not be decoded properly

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
